version_description:
- Bug fixes
- Improved stability
- Several bug fixes

Main changes:
- added Champions Cup Event
- added Achievements
- added new goalkeeper model
- reworked goalkeeper AI
- customizable match with variable location, weather, game duration and match mode
- inapp purchase to remove interstitial ads

UI redesign/adjustments:
- new UI for Match Preview
- new UI for Team Selection
- polish of various UI elements and animations

Other:
- various fixes and optimizations

- Player names and numbers added to kits
- Team Edit functionality added
- 6 new North American teams added
- New Main menu and updated game tutorial
- Minor bugfixes and performance tweaks
